name: @mimic/design-tokens
description: Design tokens generated from Penpot using Style Dictionary

scripts.build: pnpm run build:tokens && pnpm run build:types
scripts.test:tokens: node -e "const tokens = require('./dist/json/tokens.json'); console.log('Tokens loaded successfully:', Object.keys(tokens).length, 'categories');"
scripts.validate: node -e "const { validateTokens } = require('./dist/index.js'); const tokens = require('./tokens/base.json'); const result = validateTokens(tokens); console.log('Validation result:', result);"
scripts.tokens:sync: pnpm run tokens:export && pnpm run build:tokens
scripts.tokens:watch: pnpm run tokens:sync && pnpm run watch
scripts.tokens:validate: pnpm run build && pnpm test && pnpm run validate
